00045 class KVILIB_API KviIrcMask : public KviHeapObject
00046 {

00067

00074         : m_szNick(ircUser.m_szNick), m_szUser(ircUser.m_szUser), m_szHost(ircUser.m_szHost) {};

00083         KviIrcMask(const QString & nick, const QString & user, const QString & host)
00084         : m_szNick(nick), m_szUser(user), m_szHost(host) {};

00089         enum MaskType
00090         {
00091                 NickUserHost = 0,           
00092                 NickUserNet = 1,            
00093                 NickUser = 2,               
00094                 NickHost = 3,               
00095                 NickNet = 4,                
00096                 Nick = 5,                   
00097                 UserHost = 6,               
00098                 UserNet = 7,                
00099                 User = 8,                   
00100                 Host = 9,                   
00101                 Net = 10,                   
00102                 NickCleanUserHost = 11,     
00103                 NickCleanUserNet = 12,      
00104                 NickCleanUser = 13,         
00105                 CleanUserHost = 14,         
00106                 CleanUserNet = 15,          
00107                 CleanUser = 16,             
00108                 NickUserLargeNet = 17,

00110                 UserLargeNet = 19,

00119 public:
00127         void setNick(const QString & szNick){ m_szNick = szNick.isEmpty() ? m_szWild : szNick; };
00128 
00136         void setUsername(const QString & szUser){ m_szUser = szUser.isEmpty() ? m_szWild : szUser; };
00137 
00146         void setUser(const QString &szUser){ m_szUser = szUser.isEmpty() ? m_szWild : szUser; };
00147 
00155         void setHost(const QString &szHost){ m_szHost = szHost.isEmpty() ? m_szWild : szHost; };
00156 
00157         // Sets the host , nick and username extracting it from an irc mask:
00158         // nick!user@host
00159         // The mask is terminated by end-of string null character or a character equal to c in the string.
00160         // Returns the pointer to the end of the mask in the szMask string.(c or null-terminator)
00161         //const char * setMask(const QString &szMask,char c=' ');
00162 
00163         // Sets the host , nick and username extracting it from an userhost mask:
00164         // nick[*]=<+|->user@host
00165         // The mask is terminated by end-of string null char or a space character.
00166         // Returns the pointer to the next non-space char in the szMask string or to the null-terminator
00167         // If there are no more masks avaiable.
00168         // WARNING : the szMask pointer can NOT be NULL
00169         //const char *setUserhostMask(const QString &szMask);
00170 
00177         const QString & nick() const { return m_szNick; };
00178 
00185         const QString & user() const { return m_szUser; };
00186 
00193         const QString & host() const { return m_szHost; };
00194 
00199         bool hasUser() const { return !(m_szUser.isEmpty() || (m_szUser == m_szWild)); };
00200 
00205         bool hasHost() const { return !(m_szHost.isEmpty() || (m_szHost == m_szWild)); };
00206

00248 
00254         bool matchesFixed(const KviIrcMask & mask) const;
00255 
00261         //bool matchedBy(const QString &szMask) const;
00262         bool matchedBy(const KviIrcMask & mask) const { return mask.matchesFixed(*this); };
